title: Diabolist
summaries: The Diabolist is a Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy that spawns in the Dungeon after Plantera is defeated. Diabolists attack by firing blazing magic bolts that can travel through blocks at the player. These bolts explode, creating a large flaming sphere that lasts for 3.83 seconds and deals massive damage on contact. Both the bolts and the spheres inflict the On Fire! debuff for 8–15 / 16–30 / 20–37.5 seconds. Diabolists teleport to a different location on-screen after firing six projectiles or upon being hit.
Diabolists are most common in Dungeon areas with <linked>Tiled Walls</linked>, as indicated by the <linked>Diabolic Sigils</linked> present within these sections.
